sentences.en: An imputation against a woman's chastity is defamatory.
sentences.cn: 诋毁妇女贞操是破坏妇女名誉的行为.

sentences.en: He resented the imputation that he had any responsibility for what she did.
sentences.cn: 把她所作的事情要他承担,这一责难,使他非常恼火.

sentences.en: I cannot rest under an imputation.
I could not rest under the imputation.
I'm quite willing to accept the imputation.
If his reply agrees with your statement, you shall be publicly cleared from every imputation.
sentences.cn: 要是他的回信和你的叙述相符, 那就当众给你雪洗这一切莫须有的罪名.

sentences.en: The imputation that it was all his fault was unfair.
sentences.cn: 全是他的错的归咎是不公平的.

sentences.en: The imputation that my success was due to nepotism meant that I was not taken seriously.
sentences.cn: 那些说我的成功是靠了裙带关系的诋毁表明我并未受到认真看待.

sentences.en: The objective imputation theory is the fashion of study in German academy of criminal law.
sentences.cn: 客观归责理论是目前德国刑法学界研究的时尚理论.

words.tran_cn: 可归因的；可嫁祸的；使负责的
